topic.title: Change Application Fonts
topic.shortdesc: Change tier fonts and/or user interface (UI) fonts.

section.p: From the Fonts tab of the Preferences dialog:

li.p: Click the font listed underneath each UI element to change it.
li.itemgroup: The Choose font dialog will appear.

li.p: Choose the desired Font and Size, select Bold and/or Italic if required, then click Ok.
li.itemgroup: The font displayed in Session Editor will reflect your choices.

li.p: Adjust size for all UI fonts using the slider.

itemgroup.note: To reset default options for a UI element, mouse over that element and click the Reset to default button which appears on the right.
